alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 2:05PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Dodge, west central Telfair and southeastern Wilcox Counties through 230 PM EST... At 205 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Browning, or near Abbeville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Milan, Rhine, Browning and Temperance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central Georgia.
